alert.note: Alert for McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 29 at 8:04PM CDT until July 29 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL DUNN AND SOUTHEASTERN MCKENZIE COUNTIES... At 702 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Killdeer, or 28 miles southeast of Watford City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Mesonet. At 648 MDT, a 79 mph wind gust was reported 2 miles east of Grassy Butte. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Oakdale. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
